Class Algorithm

java.lang.Object
co.edu.unbosque.model.Algorithm
public class Algorithm extends Object

  • Method Details

    • orKMP

      public String orKMP​(String text, String key)
      This method is for find by the algorithm KMP and have two parameters, one is for the text and the word o letter that is the key
      Parameters:
      text - is type String and have the text of the user. text != null
      key - is the word or letter to find type String. key != null
      Returns:
      the position with the message

    • cutText

      public String cutText​(String text, String key, String algorithm)
      This method cut the text to be read in search by the method that user select.
      Parameters:
      text - is type String and have the text of the user. text != null
      key - is the word or letter to find type String. key != null
      algorithm - is a variable type String that is the algorithm selected by the user. algorithm != "Select algorithm"
      Returns:
      message with the times repeated in the text the word or letter

    • orBM

      public String orBM​(String text, String key)
      This method is for find by the algorithm KMP and have two parameters, one is for the text and the word o letter that is the key
      Parameters:
      text - is type String and have the text of the user. text != null
      key - is the word or letter to find type String. key != null
      Returns:
      the position with the message

    • getNext

      public int[] getNext​(String pat, int[] next)
      This method will check the the next position in the text for method KMP.
      Parameters:
      pat - is type String and is for text. pat != null
      next - is an array of int and will do the positions.
      Returns:
      the next position in the text.

    • implementKMP

      public int implementKMP​(String txt, String pat, int[] next, int i)
      This method will implement the algorithm of KMP with the text that user entered before.
      Parameters:
      txt - is the variable type String and is the text of the user. txt != null
      pat - will be the key that is word or letter that user wants to find. pat != null
      next - is an array of int and will do the positions.
      i - is the variable type int and is the position where will be starting find the word or letter. i >= 0
      Returns:
      the position where is find it the word o letter in the text if there's not have any letter will be return -1 .

    • getRight

      public void getRight​(String pat, int[] right)
      This method will get the position with the key that is send it in the parameter.
      Parameters:
      pat - is type String an is the key. pat != null
      right - is an array of int and will do the positions.

    • implementBM

      public int implementBM​(String txt, String pat, int[] right, int i)
      This method will implement the algorithm of BM with the text that user entered before.
      Parameters:
      txt - is the variable type String and is the text of the user. txt != null
      pat - will be the key that is word or letter that user wants to find. pat != null
      right - is an array of int and will do the positions.
      i - is the variable type int and is the position where will be starting find the word or letter. i >= 0
      Returns:
      the position where is find it the word o letter in the text if there's not have any letter will be return -1 .
